sentinel.ged
Class GECAAgent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sentinel.ged.GECAAgent
public class GECAAgent
extends java.lang.Object

This GECAAgent class is provided to support the global event detection. This class contains main method used to start the global event detector.

Method Summary
static GECAAgent initializeGECAAgent()
          This method initializes some of the data structures used by the Global Event Detector (GED), instantiating global node manager, global interface.
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          This main method is used to start the GED.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

initializeGECAAgent

public static GECAAgent initializeGECAAgent()
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method initializes some of the data structures used by the Global Event Detector (GED), instantiating global node manager, global interface. It also read the configuration from Global.config.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This main method is used to start the GED.
